comment: Hahaha go ahead, beat your head against that wall. Spend a thousand hours developing only to have the app banned in minutes.

comment: I've thought about that. I think developing in small increments is best. First put out a small and bare bones app (with limited capabilities) in weeks. If it's not banned, then continue to work on it and make it more full featured.
